sell_table.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SELL_TABLE (id REAL, time REAL, symbol TEXT, price REAL, quantity REAL, state INT)

buy_table.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BUY_TABLE (id REAL, time REAL, symbol TEXT, price REAL, quantity REAL, state INT)

operations_table.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS OPERATIONS_TABLE (time REAL, symbol TEXT, profit FLOAT)
